alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 3:54PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Leake County through 430 PM CDT... At 354 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Renfroe, or 8 miles northeast of Carthage, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Leake County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
